summary: BRAKES LOCKED UP 3/2017 HAD IT TOWED TO ANDERSON JEEP IN AZ. THEY REPLACED THE ABS MODULE AND HCU.  100 DAYS LATER THEY LOCKED UP AGAIN IN MN. TOWED TO FOREST LAKE JEEP.  WHEN TESTED IT WORKED OK THEN LATER THEY DROVE IT AND IT LOCKED UP WHILE THEY WERE TRAVELING DOWN THE ROAD. CODES SHOWED SAME PARTS HAVE TO BE REPLACED.  THEY DON'T FEEL CONFIDENT THAT THIS WILL CORRECT THE PROBLEM.  WE ARE CONCERNED THAT THIS WILL CAUSE A SAFETY PROBLEM IN THE FUTURE. THE LATEST WAS ON A CITY STREET WHILE CAR WAS IN MOTION.
